title: What are a few examples of small, good tech  blogs? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of great tech blogs out there. Of course you have the biggest ones everyone knows about like TechCrunch, but there are many smaller ones that provide useful information. Sometimes it is in these small tech blogs that you can find really useful, unbiased information and it is helpful to know some of the best ones. Here is a list of some good, smaller sized tech blogs: AmberMaclouisgray.comHome | TechFruitChris PirilloItechcode - Blogging Tips, Online Money Making, SEO TipsTechPointTechgreet.comTechnology PersonalizedShoutMeLoudSteps To Start A BlogBlogTyrantAll Tech Buzz - Best Tips and Tricks on InternetStratechery by Ben ThompsonHope that helps.

Those are great tech blogs for sure, and there are plenty more out there that fly under most of our radars but deserve a mention. Here are a few of my favorites: Ghacks - Martin Brinkmann writes about topics that most other tech blogs tend to ignore. His posts are well written and informative. Redmond Pie - Although the name would have you believe this blog is all about Microsoft products and technologies, it actually covers a wide range of tech topics including products and news from the worlds of Apple and Google. RicksDailyTips - Disclaimer: This is my own blog, so take that into account when you read the following: RicksDailyTips is all about making technology simple and easy to understand. It offers thousands of “How to” posts covering a wide range of tech topics. Reader questions are also answered in a truthful, straight-forward way. Winaero - This one really is all about the Microsoft Windows ecosystem. You’ll find plenty of timely Windows tips, tricks and news here.
